- Baloncesto callejero
- Nuevos tipos de desaf√≠os
- Nuevo personaje: Jugador de baloncesto

- Daily Trial game mode has arrived to Drive Ahead! Sports
- Compete against other players in leaderboards

New Sport: Motorsport
3 New Levels
Daily Trial replays

New Sport: Motorsport
3 New Levels
Daily Trial replays
Bug fixes

New Character: Dragster
7 New Daily Trials
4 New Challenges
3 New Levels

Bug fixes and optimization
Added character selection to challenges and daily trials!
Daily trial now gives the chosen character's upgrade points as reward

Get a new prize daily!
New character: Fox

There might be something special on the spooky weekend of October 28th and lasting until 31st!
We keep improving the game! There are bug fixes and overall optimization!

Get a sneak peek of the upcoming new sport: Volleyball! in the volleyball event between 18th and 26th of November
Bug fixes and optimization

In this update for DriveAhead! Sports, you can become a stronger Sports Gladiator: Complete missions in the Sport you choose and score an ace in Volleyball

* New Progression System: Follow a path to become a better Sports Gladiator by beating opponents. Discover surprise missions and gain rewards!
* New Menus: We listened to you and introduced some changes. You can now pick up your favourite Sport to play. Master skills and train your characters more powerful through missions.
* New Sport: Volleyball is officially here. Jump into it the action, spike the ball into your opponent's court, and enjoy the crazy experience of Volleyball in Drive Ahead! style!!!
